trans-unit.source: Processor for Linguistic Annotation Framework ISO 24612:2012), applied to Biblical Hebrew
trans-unit.target: 应用于《圣经》希伯来语的语言注释框架ISO 24612:2012的处理器。

trans-unit.source: Tools to read LAF resources (Linguistic Annotation Framework ISO 24612:2012) and analyse them efficiently. With additions for the Hebrew Text Database of the ETCBC (Eep Talstra Centre for Bible and Computing).
trans-unit.target: 读取LAF资源(语言学注释框架ISO 24612:2012)并有效分析的工具。为ETCBC(Eep Talstra圣经和计算机中心)的希伯来语文本数据库增加了一些内容。

trans-unit.source: emdros2laf: conversion from the format in which the ETCBC delivers its data (http://emdros.org) to LAF.
trans-unit.target: emdros2laf：从ETCBC将其数据（http://emdros.org）传递给LAF的格式的转换。

trans-unit.source: etcbc: modules on top of laf that make use of the characteristics of the Text Database of the Hebrew Bible by the ETCBC.
trans-unit.target: etcbc:在laf之上的模块,利用ETCBC的希伯来圣经文本数据库的特点。

trans-unit.source: laf: processor for LAF resources, specialized in handling resources with millions of nodes and edges.
trans-unit.target: laf:LAF资源的处理器,专门处理有数百万节点和边的资源。
